item.title: Acer Chromebook R 13 Convertible CB5-312T-K5X4
item.description: The Acer Chromebook R 13 CB5-312T-K5X4 is a 13.3-inch laptop powered by a 2.1 GHz quad-core MediaTek M8173C processor.

item.title: Acer C720P-2103 Chromebook
item.description: The Acer C720P-2103 Chromebook has an 11.6-inch screen and is powered by a dual-core Intel Celeron 2955U processor.

item.title: Acer Chromebook 11 CB3-131-C3SZ
item.description: The Acer Chromebook 11 CB3-131-C3SZ is a slim and lightweight laptop with a 11.6-inch widescreen IPS display. It is equipped with a dual-core Intel Celeron N2840 processor, 2 GB RAM and 16 GB SSD storage.

item.title: Acer Chromebook 14 CB3-431-C5FM
item.description: The Acer Chromebook 14 CB3-431-C5FM is a slim and lightweight laptop with a 14-inch full HD IPS display. It is equipped with a quad-core Intel Celeron N3150 processor, 4 GB RAM and 32 GB eMMC storage.

item.title: Acer Chromebook R 11 CB5-132T-C32M
item.description: The Acer Chromebook R 11 CB5-132T-C32M is an 11.6-inch laptop powered by a 1.6 GHz quad-core Intel Celeron N3150 Braswell processor.

item.title: Acer C720-3404 Chromebook
item.description: The Acer C720-3404 is an 11.6-inch Chromebook powered by a 4th Generation Intel Core i3 processor. It comes with 4 GB RAM, a 32 GB solid-state drive and offers up to 8.5 hours of battery life.
